YOUR ULTIMATE DESTINATION FOR SEAMLESS EXHIBITIONS, TRADE SHOWS, AND EVENTS.

  • Superb build quality from experienced craftsmen

OUR PORTFOLIO
View Portfolio
Get Quotation

Our Products

EXHIBITION SERVICES
MALL KIOSK
EVENT & CONFERENCES
INTERIOR & FIT OUT
SUPPORT FROM START TO FINISH

Our team offer a solid knowledge of all areas of exhibitions and trade shows and understand your marketing needs. Our experienced designers will help you to visualise your project. Our production team will answer any concerns and keep you informed across the entire process. Our graphic designers, project managers, AV and logistic specialists will all work together to make your exhibition or trade show experience as seamless as possible

WE KNOW THIS BUSINESS

As a company, we have been in the exhibition and trade show industry now for over 11 years and have built on our knowledge and experience. We enjoy on-going relationships with exhibition organisers & international production companies

WE CAN ADVISE ON YOUR BRAND MARKETING

Your exhibition or trade show is only a small part of the process of brand building and sales generating. We can help with the ‘bigger picture’ so that your exhibiting experience becomes part of a larger, successful marketing endeavour.

ORIGINAL AND FUNCTIONAL DESIGN

You want your brand to stand out among your competitors. To do that you need to connect with your customers….and to do that effectively, you need the right environment. Our many years of experience in this industry have made us really good at defining, designing and creating environments and experiences conducive to building business relationships.

EXPERIENCED ON-SITE TEAM

The work maxim for ExproGlobal is that we care about our clients. This incorporates our whole team including our on-site project managers and workers. Not only will they set up your stand but they are there to help you and will not leave until you are 100% satisfied with your space.

 
MANY YEARS IN THE BUSINESS

Your marketing budget is not a bottomless pit of funds. You need to make spending choices wisely. There’s no point investing in fabulous events or an amazing exhibition stand if a substantial return on your investment is not achieved.  We have been in this business for many years. We can advise you how to play to your strengths and avoid the many pitfalls. Our experience can be your asset.

View More Details

Here what clients say about ExproGlobal

"ExproGlobal exceeded our expectations with their fantastic exhibition stand design! Their creativity and professionalism were evident from start to finish. The entire process was smooth, and they delivered a high-quality stand that attracted a lot of attention at the event. We will definitely be working with them again!"
Sarah L.Marketing Manager
"I can’t recommend ExproGlobal highly enough! Their team was great to work with, and the stand they built for us was top-notch. The attention to detail, timely execution, and commitment to meeting our requirements made a huge difference. We received so many compliments on our booth, and it certainly helped us stand out."
John M.Event Coordinator
"Working with ExproGlobal was an absolute pleasure! They listened to our vision and brought it to life with a stunning exhibition stand that was both functional and aesthetically appealing. The entire team was responsive and professional, making sure every aspect of the stand was perfect. Thank you, ExproGlobal!"
Emily R.Trade Show Manager
"ExproGlobal is hands down the best exhibition stand contractor we’ve worked with. Their ability to combine creativity with functionality is remarkable. The stand was not only eye-catching but also practical for our team to use during the show. Their attention to detail and timely delivery made the whole process hassle-free."
David T.Operations Director
"From concept to completion, ExproGlobal nailed it! The design they created for our booth was modern, sleek, and perfectly reflected our brand. Their team was organized and efficient, ensuring the entire setup went smoothly. We couldn’t have asked for a better partner for our exhibition needs. Highly recommend!"
Olivia K.Brand Manager

Understanding the Importance of Exhibition Stand Design

Exhibition stands are an essential element of any successful trade show or event. A well-designed and eye-catching stand can help businesses stand out from the competition, attract potential customers, and showcase their products or services. It is crucial to understand the importance of exhibition stand design and how it can impact the success of your business at events.
